summary: A hand crafted island for your relaxing needs.
descriptionHtml:
Hello there.

Ever wanted a small socluded little island to yourself with all the little things you need to relax and rest your feet?, then this mod is for you!.

This was a mod project i did a while back but never managed to finish it untill now!, it has storage for some of your belongings, blacksmithy and a place to rest your head after a long days exploring.

[youtube]BIRBb_pDeKQ[/youtube] 

===Features===

-Outside featured island with vast details and hand placed flora and terrain
-Blacksmithing includes:
.Anvil
.sharpening wheel
.workbench
.Tanning rack
.Enchanting table
.Alchemy table
-Storage chests scattered around.
-Comes complete with seats and tents and also a place to cook. 

===updates===
V1.1
+New tower added
+More benches added 
V1.2
+Added gate to the island
+Added guards around the island to give a more alive feeling to it
+Added requested chopping block
=Fixed Stair walking problem near docks.

This was a little mod for one purpose in mind so if you think you need this then please subscribe and rate the mod. Thanks :P
author: Countercruel
